description: Try our easy to follow Cannoli with Choc-Orange Mascarpone recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cannoli with Choc-Orange Mascarpone Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the filling, gently whisk mascarpone and cocoa together until combined. Stir in chocolate, orange rind and orange juice. Spoon mixture into a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle. Pipe mixture into cannoli. Dust with icing sugar. Serve.
